label: 宮内省
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Its most important offices and bureaus were concerned with the comfort of the Imperial Family and the construction and maintenance of Palace buildings: Palace Table Office (Daizenshiki), Carpentry Bureau (Mokuryō), Bureau of Grounds (Tonomo[ri]ryō), Bureau of Housekeeping (Kamonryō), Imperial Table Office (Naizenshi),  Shimotsudokoro (Serving Office),  Mizushidokoro (Palace Kitchen Office) (pp. 811-12). [大膳職、木工寮、主殿寮、掃部寮、内膳司、進物所、御厨子所]
